name: Agent Brain Self-Improvement Package
description: Meta-expertise for improving Agent Brain using Agent Brain itself

rules.name: No Intelligence Pretense
rules.description: Never pretend to have intelligence you don't possess
rules.requirement: Use honest stage numbers and mechanical descriptions instead of arbitrary confidence scores
rules.rationale: Trust comes from honesty about capabilities

rules.name: No Developer Jargon
rules.description: Use friendly names that novices understand
rules.requirement: Replace technical terms with friendly equivalents
rules.rationale: Target users have <6 months coding experience

rules.name: One Capability Per Stage
rules.description: Each enhancement stage must add exactly ONE capability
rules.requirement: Create new stage class that adds single capability and chains to previous
rules.rationale: Enables independent testing and graceful degradation
rules.validation: Count number of distinct enhancements in enhance() method

rules.name: Context Before Intelligence
rules.requirement: Stages 1-6 must work without any LLM
rules.rationale: 80% of value comes from mechanical context injection

rules.name: Convert Errors to Learnings
rules.description: Every detected error should become a learning opportunity
rules.requirement: Show error recovery UI and offer to create learning

rules.name: Simple First, Complex on Demand
rules.description: UI must use progressive disclosure for novice users

rules.name: Make Knowledge Visible
rules.description: All knowledge must be visible with checkboxes
rules.requirement: Show checkboxes for all knowledge items
rules.rationale: Users can't trust what they can't see

rules.name: Fallback on Failure
rules.description: Advanced features must degrade to simpler ones
rules.requirement: Implement fallback to lower stage on error
rules.rationale: System remains useful even with failures

rules.name: Track Everything
rules.description: Measure actual success instead of guessing
rules.requirement: Add metrics tracking for feature effectiveness

rules.name: Force Planning First
rules.description: AI must create plan before implementation
rules.requirement: Inject planning template before code generation
rules.rationale: Prevents execution myopia in AI agents
